name: Beat Sports Remote
description:
Important: Beat Sports™ Remote requires Beat Sports for Apple TV.

Beat Sports Remote is the official companion app for the music game Beat Sports on the new Apple TV.

Play Beat Sports’ “Buddy Ball” with up to 4 simultaneous players by connecting up to 3 iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch devices to the same Wi-Fi network as your Apple TV. The 1st player will use the Apple TV Siri Remote.

Want to join the Beat Sports fun? Get it in the App Store on the new Apple TV.

Terms of Service: http://www.beatsportsgame.com/terms
